entry.title: NSNotification and view controller
entry.content:
I have created a number of custom UIViewController for UICollectionViewCell programmatically. Apple makes it really easy to create good looking GUI. AutoLayout is not as bad as I heard from the blogsphere.

Now I want to be able to have these UIViewController to subscribe to an adhoc NSNotification. I have tried a few things but my custom UIViewController just do not receive any notification at all.

It turns out it is because the controllers instances have gone out of scope. In order to keep them around in memory, I added a NSMutableDictionary to keep reference to these controllers.
